hero_paragraph: With the mission of providing convenient and reliable solutions, Felix specializes in providing equipment and services to support the Internet and communication needs of foreigners living and working in Japan.
intro_text_1:
Global connection
Anytime, anywhere
With the mission of providing convenient and reliable solutions, Felix specializes in providing equipment and services to support the Internet and communication needs of foreigners living and working in Japan.
intro_text_2: Felix aims to become the leading company in providing specialized telecommunication services, bringing maximum satisfaction to foreigners in Japan.
advantages_section_lead: Cost-effective - accurate and brings great value to customers
advantage1_title: Stable and secure 4G/5G signal quality for end devices
advantage1_text: Better signal quality as data is transmitted via a private line directly from the network operator to the customer, not over the public internet.
advantage2_title: Tighter management of SIMs and metering devices
advantage2_text: SimIoT facilitates customer convenience in monitoring and managing SIMs from metering points through SIM management software.
advantage3_text: Data transmission method via a virtual private network on the mobile telecommunications network meets information security requirements.
advantage4_text: Installation costs are only 1/10 of current costs, and data plans offer higher speeds at lower costs than current plans.
components_section_lead: We provide service packages with comprehensive solutions, including the following components
component_private_line_text: 1 primary and 1 backup channel with high bandwidth, transmitting data directly from the network operator to the customer's servers
component_packages_text: Diverse data plans with various capacities from major network operators
component_private_apn_text: Custom configured to suit customer requirements
component_subscriber_number_text: Each SIM blank comes with a subscriber number
component_support_service_text: 24/7 support to answer inquiries and resolve customer issues
plans_section_lead: Choose the product type that suits your connectivity needs.
partners_section_lead: We are proud to be trusted by and partner with leading businesses and organizations.
contact_company_name: Technology and Communication Development Investment Joint Stock Company
contact_address: 2nd Floor, CT2 Trang An Complex, No. 1 Phung Chi Kien Street, Nghia Do Ward, Cau Giay District, Hanoi City
modal_register_intro: Please fill in the information below to create an account and explore our services.
